name: api_physics_Cloth
description: The Cloth class provides an interface to cloth simulation physics.

properties.name: bendingStiffness
properties.description: Bending stiffness of the cloth.

properties.name: capsuleColliders
properties.description: An array of CapsuleColliders which this Cloth instance should collide with.

properties.name: clothSolverFrequency
properties.description: Number of cloth solver iterations per second.

properties.name: coefficients
properties.description: The cloth skinning coefficients used to set up how the cloth interacts with the skinned mesh.

properties.name: collisionMassScale
properties.description: How much to increase mass of colliding particles.

properties.name: damping
properties.description: Damp cloth motion.

properties.name: enableContinuousCollision
properties.description: Enable continuous collision to improve collision stability.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Is this cloth enabled?

properties.name: externalAcceleration
properties.description: A constant, external acceleration applied to the cloth.

properties.name: friction
properties.description: The friction of the cloth when colliding with the character.

properties.name: normals
properties.description: The current normals of the cloth object.

properties.name: randomAcceleration
properties.description: A random, external acceleration applied to the cloth.

properties.name: selfCollisionDistance
properties.description: Minimum distance at which two cloth particles repel each other (default: 0.0).

properties.name: selfCollisionStiffness
properties.description: Self-collision stiffness defines how strong the separating impulse should be for colliding particles.

properties.name: sleepThreshold
properties.description: Cloth's sleep threshold.

properties.name: sphereColliders
properties.description: An array of ClothSphereColliderPairs which this Cloth instance should collide with.

properties.name: stiffnessFrequency
properties.description: Sets the stiffness frequency parameter.

properties.name: stretchingStiffness
properties.description: Stretching stiffness of the cloth.

properties.name: useGravity
properties.description: Should gravity affect the cloth simulation?

properties.name: useTethers
properties.description: Use Tether Anchors.
